do you have any other plugins in your workspace that contribute launch shortcuts? It seems (from the error message) that when we try to create the delegate class it is failing to create an executable extension.

Also we should not be trying to pop up a dialog, we should simply be logging the error...

applied fix to HEAD to not popup dialog when delegate loading fails, waiting for confirmation of invalid class specified in launch shortcut definition to mark as fixed.

Curtis please verify the chnage to not pop up a dialog
Verified the change to log the error instead of popping up a dialog.
